Package net.minestom.server.event

Class GlobalHandles

java.lang.Object
net.minestom.server.event.GlobalHandles
@Internal public final class GlobalHandles extends Object
Contains handles to the main node MinecraftServer.getGlobalEventHandler() (compatible with EventDispatcher).
